dict.acceptation: 舌头，喙；语言，方言；演说，鞋舌；[复]口才；
用舌吹；舔；嵌接；[古]批评，指责；
吹奏（管乐器）；运用舌法发音；突出；

sent.orig: TCM examination: Tongue: The body tongue was normal. Red with white and yellow coating tongue.
sent.trans: 舌脉：舌体正常，舌红，苔黄白相间，脉位中，脉弦滑。

sent.orig: Mr. Tongue Twister tried to teach tongue to twist and turn, and twit an twat.
sent.trans: 汤·迪斯先生努力教你舌头怎样去“扭”去“翻”去“转”去“挖苦”那些舌头笨拙的人。

sent.orig: Mr. Tongue Twister tried to teach your tongue to twist and turn, and twit an twat.
sent.trans: 汤迪斯特先生努力教你的舌头怎样去“扭”去“翻”去“转”去“挖苦”那些舌头笨拙的人。

sent.orig: I bit my tongue (literally: my tongue was bitten and harmed by my teeth) .
sent.trans: 我的舌头被牙齿咬伤了。

sent.orig: When ice tongue such as the Jakobshavn calves, the glacier feeding that ice tongue typically accelerates.
sent.trans: 当诸如雅各布港冰川之类的冰舌崩离时，冰川为了补给冰舌通常会加速流动。
